report.title: Really Turned On
report.author: phxbot
report.bodytext: /n /n /n 11:30 bought two packs of Eight Ballz bath salt. snorted one half or 2.5 g; made mistake and snorted large amount. /n /n 11:45 put on porn, very excited but hard to achieve erection seems like meth dick /n /n 12:00 really kicking in; euphoria, sexual desire, feel very confident /n /n 12:15 really turned on by porn; extremely thirsty; watching porn as I write; I am biwm; would do anything for sex; left front door open to see if anyone would join me; nothing /n /n 1:00 coming down; drinking several small bottles of water /n /n 1:15 snorted remaining half; not noticing a high but more of a mellow feeling; this is good /n /n 1:30 very sexual but still cant get it up; addicted to [] for porn /n /n 1:38 a bit jittery; still playing with myself /n /n 1:45 more jitters still cant get it up; will use when I bottom, but not top will use with guys not girls; keep drinking water but it does not help; on my 4th bottle of water (16 oz); mental facilities good, slight imbalance when walking; really turned on /n /n 2:00 coming down off high rapidly; feel very tired; will try to get some sleep; first will try to jack off; still very horny /n /n [Reported Dose: '5 g']
